data.title: Luke Ridnour Fantasy Basketball News, Rankings, Projections
data.meta_description: View expert consensus rankings for Luke Ridnour (), read the latest news and get detailed fantasy basketball statistics.
data.text:
Luke Ridnour to sit out 2015-16 season

After being traded 4 times in the offseason, Luke Ridnour has decided to sit out the 2015-16 NBA season. His return to professional basketball is doubtful.

Fantasy Impact

Ridnour has had a lengthy and serviceable NBA career. At 34 years old, Ridnour may not appear on a NBA basketball court again.
